title: The Domino Queen
description: Wherever dark pleasure reigns, there the Domino Queen keeps her court. Whether she's initiating a lonely peasant girl or training a trio of eager slaves, Josephine deals out tenderness and cruelty with an even, elegant hand, in this third entry in the Domino trilogy. Meanwhile Cadence Szathkowicz, the lover Josephine abandoned on Dominica, is searching for her. From pulsating Los Angeles to the strict discipline of Madame Surikoâ€™s house in Chicago, Cadence travels on an odyssey of pleasure and pain. All she has to guide her is the sign Josephine wears between her the tattoo of the domino mask.
author: Cyrian Amberlake
